entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Seattle location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-10-05 07:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-10-05 11:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Seattle instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Tokyo location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-09-28 15:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-09-28 19:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Tokyo instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While itâ€™s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

Our Cloud Storage team is investigating a partial outage situation with our Object Storage infrastructure. The following services may be impacted by this event:

- Object Storage Subscription management
- Adding or removing buckets
- S3 client issues

We are working quickly to restore service to its optimal state.

service_alerts.subject: Seattle Block Storage Maintenance - VPS Downtime - 2023-09-26

entries.message:
Event Type: Block Storage Infrastructure Maintenance
Start Time: 2023-09-26 18:00:00 America/EST
End Time: 2023-09-27 02:00:00 America/EST

Our Cloud Storage team will be performing one last round of Maintenance starting at 2023-09-26 21:00:00 UTC. During this maintenance window, creating, attaching, resizing, and deletion of HDD Block Storage volumes may be temporarily unavailable.

During this maintenance window we will be performing the final migration of your block storage data to our new cluster. The process will involve powering down your VM, detaching the storage, copying it to the new cluster, and finally re-attach the block storage and restart your VM.

We can not specify when exactly your VM will need to be powered off as we are moving one block at a time but your total downtime should be anywhere from <5 minutes to 30 depending on the size of your block storage volume.

Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience this may cause. 

If you have any additional questions please open a support ticket.
We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Madrid location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.
